    • cleanUpReplicas

      private void cleanUpReplicas​(java.lang.Integer maximumReplicaAge)
      This function is used to clean up old replicas from the class ConcurrentHashMap that contains all addresses of all PlaceManager.
      Parameters:
      maximumReplicaAge - Contains the max age of the replica we should consider. Must be in milliseconds.
